title: [娱乐]Randombox——开箱子插件！在MC中体验开箱子的快感吧！支持GUI！[1.72-1.81]
author: qqlikemc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:40 编辑 

插件名称:Randombox顾名思义，就是随机盒子。支持1.72-1.81版本。从2.2版本开始支持GUI显示。会在一个大号箱子的GUI里随机横向转动来选取奖励。奖励可以随机设置，LORE和名字也可以设置。停止更新！你可以去原贴下载新版本参照本帖来设置和使用GUI:






IMG_2355.PNG (194 KB, 下载次数: 106)

下载附件

2015-5-4 19:02 上传




指令与权限
/givebox <player> <box id>: gives box to player.  给某个玩家盒子 数量
/openbox: opens the box in your hand.   打开你手里的盒子
/randombox, /rb: plugin info.  随机盒子 
/randombox reload: reload config from disk.  重新载入
/randombox list: show all boxes in config  显示所有盒子信息和数字ID

randombox.*: 管理用权限.
randombox.main: 可以使用获得盒子的权限.
randombox.main.reload: 重载盒子的权限.
randombox.openbox: 打开盒子的权限.
randombox.givebox: 给予盒子的权限.
randombox.infinitebox: 盒子打开后不会消失 需要在配置文件中开启无限盒子.
randombox.open.<box id>: 只能开启某ID的盒子，需要在配置文件内checkPermission打开才行.
randombox.open.*: 可以打开所有箱子。只有在配置文件的checkPermission配置设置为true才行.

配置文件如下，请注意查看我的注释。红色。
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# Disable this, if you don't want to use
# gui for boxes.
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
gui: false     #GUI开关，默认关闭。注意，只有2.2以上的版本拥有这个选项。
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# If this parameter is true, in the console
# will print messages, like calculated
# probabilities.
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
debug: false
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# Use metrics. Site: http://mcstats.org
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
metrics: true
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# Enables randombox.infinitebox permission
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
useInfinitePermission: false
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
boxEnchantment: protection
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
useDataValue: false
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# All boxes that available
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
boxes:
  # Box id, must be a integer.
  # Please, use large numbers
  # to id does not intersect
  # with the standard data values.
  9901:   #盒子的ID  你可以自己修改，需要获得某个盒子的时候输入的ID就是这个，默认9901
    # Item that represents a box.
    # Recommended item is STORAGE_MINECART.
    # If that item can be used (for example, minecart can be placed on rails),
    # then you can't use it, if item is a box.
    # You can use numeric or string id.
    boxItem: STORAGE_MINECART  #盒子的模型，默认是矿车，你需要修改，注意，这里需要的是英文ID 而不是数字ID
    # Box name, can be colored with &<color code>
    boxName: '&6Warrior box'   #盒子的名称，支持颜色代码
    # Drop items amount
    # If it more than 9, gui will not open
    itemsToSelectCount: 3     #物品获取数量，默认为3，也就是开箱子能获得三个物品，随机选择。
    # Check for permission randombox.open.<box id>
    checkPermission: false   #检查权限 
    # Should box open, if player right-clicked on it?
    openWhenClicked: true   #玩家右键时，是否打开
    # Enchant box?
    enchant: true  #是否附魔箱子？
    # Box can't stack (if box item can stack by default)
    unstackable: true #盒子不能叠加
    # Items that can drop
    items:
      # Some name
      item1:
        # Item id (numeric or string)
        item: DIAMOND_SWORD  #物品英文ID
        # Data value
        data: 0   #损坏度/种类
        # Item amount
        amount: 1   #数量
        # Item name, can be colored with &<color code>
        # If there is no "name" parameter,
        # item will not added to list in box lore.
        name: '&cDiamond sword'      #物品显示名称
        # Item lore, can be colored with &<color code>
        # Format: every list item - 'item'
        # is another line.
        lore:    #物品lore
        - '&7This sword dropped'
        - '&7from a box.'
        # Enchants on item.
        # Format: <ench name>:<any level>
        enchants:    #附魔
          sharpness: 8
          unbreaking: 5
          fire: 4
          knockback: 2
        # Message, that will send to other players when this item dropped.
        # Remove it or leave empty to disable broadcasting.
        # %player% will be replaced with name of player, which opened box.
        broadcastMessage: '&6%player% got an amazing diamond sword from RandomBox!' #信息提示
        # Probability of drop
        chance: 2 #概率
      item2:
        item: IRON_SWORD
        amount: 1
        name: '&6Iron sword'
        enchants:
          sharpness: 5
          unbreaking: 3
          knockback: 2
        chance: 3
      item3:
        item: STONE_SWORD
        amount: 1
        name: '&eStone sword'
        enchants:
          sharpness: 3
          unbreaking: 3
          knockback: 2
        chance: 4
      item4:
        item: BOW
        amount: 1
        name: '&eBow'
        enchants:
          power: 3
          unbreaking: 3
          infinity: 1
        chance: 6
      item5:
        item: GOLDEN_APPLE
        name: '&rGolden apple'
        # If true, item stack won't have a name.
        dontAssignName: true
        amount: 4
        chance: 8
      item6:
        # If this section is presented,
        # when this item drop will be
        # executed specified commands.
        #
        # In this case, player will get
        # 10 levels.
        # If you want only execute
        # commands (without giving item),
        # set dontGiveItem to true.
        commands:
          # Some name
          command1:
            # Command name without '/'
            # and arguments.
            # %player% will be replaced
            # with player name.
            line: 'xp give %player% 10L'
            # Execute command
            # from console or player
            fromConsole: true
        dontGiveItem: true #不给物品
        item: EXP_BOTTLE  #经验奖励
        name: '&rExp (10 lvl)'  #奖励名字
        amount: 1
        chance: 30
      item7:
        commands:
          command1:
            line: 'xp give %player% 6L' #指令 给某玩家6个等级
            fromConsole: true
        dontGiveItem: true
        item: EXP_BOTTLE
        name: '&rExp (6 lvl)'
        amount: 1
        chance: 35
      item8:
        commands:
          command1:
            line: 'xp give %player% 3L'
            fromConsole: true
        dontGiveItem: true
        item: EXP_BOTTLE
        name: '&rExp (3 lvl)'
        amount: 1
        chance: 45
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# Name of section with strings. You can
# add you own section and set "locale"
# parameter to it's name.
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
# Default locales:
# en (English), ru (Русский), zhcn (Chinese)
# - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
locale: en    #这里来设置语言模式，默认en，也就是英语，修改为zhcn来更换为中文。

replies.author: 超平坦之王
replies.txt_content: 可以设置放到一个地方然后开启吗？

replies.author: qqlikemc
replies.txt_content:
超平坦之王 发表于 2015-5-4 19:02
可以设置放到一个地方然后开启吗？
不可以，只能获得-打开-随机获得物品。 类似其他网游的开箱子系统。
